description: Detects different malformed user agents used in Malleable Profiles used with Cobalt Strike
name: CobaltStrike Malformed UAs in Malleable Profiles
query: (user_agent.original:("Mozilla\/4.0\ \(compatible;\ MSIE\ 6.0;Windows\ NT\ 5.1\)" OR "Mozilla\/4.0\ \(compatible;\ MSIE\ 7.0;\ Windows\ NT\ 6.1;\ WOW64;\ Trident\/4.0;\ SLCC2;\ .NET\ CLR\ 3.0.30729;\ .NET4.0C;\ .NET4.0E\ \)" OR "Mozilla\/5.0\ \(Windows;\ U;\ MSIE\ 7.0;\ Windows\ NT\ 5.2\)\ Java\/1.5.0_08") OR user_agent.original:*;\ MANM;\ MANM\))
author: Florian Roth
